review:
in my opinion it is the best movies which is ever created in the history of bollywood industry. i have seen many hollywood and bollywood movies but it is the best movie.
the acting of girish kumar and shruti hassan was an amazing. sonu sood has do very good role. vinod khanna is the key of the movie. at last i say that ramaiya vastavaiya is the best movie of bollywood. i request to the director mr. prabhu deva to make the second part of the movie please.

one of my favourite movie.this movie is emotional funny heart touching and romantic.shruti hassan is being absolutely magnificent in the movie.girish kumar has also done a great job,this movie was not able to gross at box office but still iys an amazing movie.romantic movie lovers should definately watch it.its a family movie and a good one too.
shruti hassan has become my favourite actress

one of my all type fav movie becoz of the pure and simple love story with beautiful songs... the star caste of the movie specially girish sir  nd shruti mam r perfect in their roles... shruti mam looks so stunning in this movie in her salwar suits... awwwsome movie yar just loved it

what a mindshot movie.pat see 💓.you know very well well movie. unbelievable story.i saw the movie in 15 regularly.i can't believe that how i sow that movie many time.intersting.intersting.intersting______________$uper.thanks

i don't know about original one but today i have seen this film , the good dinausur both of them are too much amazing and fun and also to mention very very emotional (p.s.  i am very sentiment al and emotional person)

it is one of my favourite movies.....i love both the actor and actress. it's just lovely...i have watched it for many times but still watch it every week 😃😃😃😃😃
so meticulously , very well woven movie. all artists have worked superbly well . sood's performance is par excellence . best wishes

in this film shruti mam and girish sir involved an important role which is like by the people. and one more thing we have to know that love is not done by rich people or poor people. in love we have never talk about rich or poor because love is love
i just loved the movie fantastic work by actor and actress on the other hand it is funny as well as touching also.... i just loved it .....
loved the role of shruti in the movie.hr character sona is educated,smart & sensitive,unlike the stereotypical roles of heroines at that tym(who intended to"only love the dream man").
it was very cliched but it that is what is wanted by the targetted audience. it was a nice story and worth a watch.
